sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"雇用"之意。
means: hire ： 普通用词，常指短期或长期雇用某人从事某一特定工作或一次性的工作，含强调为薪金而工作的意味。
employ ： 正式用词，侧重受雇者虽为薪金而工作，但工作固定共享有相当尊严。
engage可与hire换用，特指雇用专业人员。

sentence.Network_en: You can engage in croquet on the south lawn.
sentence.Network_cn: 你可以参加南边草坪上的槌球游戏。

sentence.Network_en: Press the lever until you hear the catch engage.
sentence.Network_cn: 压下挡杆，直到听到挡挂好。

sentence.Network_en: They never learned skills to engage the attention of the others.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们从未学过吸引他人注意的技巧。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 从字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 从善如流〖 readilyacceptgoodadvice〗 从事〖 engage;goinfor〗 从属〖 subordinate〗.
聘字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 聘选〖 engageandselect〗 聘用〖 engage〗 聘约〖 contract;letterofappointment〗.
医学用语_百度文库 ... operate vi.&vt. 运转；开动 engage vt. 使从事于，使忙于 put... through to... 接通(电话)….
人教版高中英语必修5单词表_百度知道 ... go by 过去;走过 engage   vt. 使订婚;约定;雇用;使从事 be engaged to sb 与某人订婚.

list.abs: 常用英文警示语 ... Stand clear of the door 请不要站在门口。 Toilet engaged 厕所有人 Train departure 出站列车.
金融英语 - 金融学考研论坛 ... EMU 欧洲货币联盟 Engagement letter 委托书 Environmental protection 环(境) 保(护).
商务英语词汇大全_外语教育网 ... dialling tone 拨号音 engaged tone 占线音 it's engaged 占线.
战争 - 搜搜百科 ... battle n. 战斗, 争斗 ; v... engagement n. 约会, 约定, 订婚... strife n. 争吵, 冲突.

entry.def: If you engage in an activity, you do it or are actively involved with it.

example.ex: I have never engaged in the drug trade...
example.tran: 我从未参与过毒品交易。

example.ex: You can engage in croquet on the south lawn.
example.tran: 你可以参加南边草坪上的槌球游戏。

entry.def: If something engages you or your attention or interest, it keeps you interested in it and thinking about it.

example.ex: They never learned skills to engage the attention of the others.
example.tran: 他们从未学过吸引他人注意的技巧。

entry.def: If you engage someone in conversation, you have a conversation with them.

example.ex: They tried to engage him in conversation...
We want to engage recognized leaders in discussion.
example.tran: 我们想和公认的领袖们进行讨论。

entry.def: If you engage with something or with a group of people, you get involved with that thing or group and feel that you are connected with it or have real contact with it.

example.ex: She found it hard to engage with office life...
example.tran: 她发现很难适应办公室生活。

example.ex: She had vowed to go out of her way to engage with the Irish people at local community level.
example.tran: 她已经发誓要努力和当地的爱尔兰人建立关系。

entry.def: If you engage someone to do a particular job, you appoint them to do it.

example.ex: We engaged the services of a recognised engineer...
example.tran: 我们雇用了一个公认的杰出工程师。

example.ex: He had been able to engage some staff.
example.tran: 他已经能够雇用一些员工。

entry.def: When a part of a machine or other mechanism engages or when you engage it, it moves into a position where it fits into something else.

example.ex: Press the lever until you hear the catch engage.
example.tran: 压下挡杆，直到听到挡挂好。

example.ex: ...a lesson in how to engage the four-wheel drive.
example.tran: 如何使四轮驱动啮合的课程

entry.def: When a military force engages the enemy, it attacks them and starts a battle.

example.ex: It could engage the enemy beyond the range of hostile torpedoes.
example.tran: 从这可以避开敌方鱼雷区对敌人发动进攻。

means.word_mean: 1. carry out or participate in an activity; be involved in;

sentences.sentence: "Her interest in butterflies absorbs her completely"
"They hired two new secretaries in the department"

means.word_mean: 4. ask to represent; of legal counsel;
7. as of wars, battles, or campaigns;

sentences.sentence: "Napoleon and Hitler waged war against all of Europe"

means.word_mean: 8. as of aid, help, services, or support
9. engage for service under a term of contract;

sentences.sentence: "We took an apartment on a quiet street"
"Shall we take a guide in Rome?"

auth_sentence.content: It allows us to engage different and younger audiences.
auth_sentence.res_content: It allows us to engage different and younger audiences.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It allows us to engage different and younger audiences.

auth_sentence.content: If you want to engage on ID then engage.
auth_sentence.res_content: If you want to engage on ID then engage.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If you want to engage on ID then engage.

auth_sentence.content: We are never going to even engage in that.
auth_sentence.res_content: We are never going to even engage in that.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We are never going to even engage in that.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 动词前缀,通常加在名词前构成动词,表示"进入……之中,包围,成为"; 2. 动词前缀,表示"使……进入状态或加强等意思"

stems_affixes.word_buile: en进入……之中,包围,成为+dem人民+ic表形容词→在人民之中→地方性的
en进入……之中,包围,成为+cage笼子→v.关入笼中
en进入……之中,包围,成为+chain锁链→v.束缚
en进入……之中,包围,成为+roll转,倦→往里倦→注册

stems_affixes.value_cn: 给……题名, 给……称号;授权, 授权
stems_affixes.word_buile: en进入……之中,包围,成为+title标题,头衔→v. 给……题名, 给……称号;授权, 授权
en进入……之中,包围,成为+trap陷阱→v.以网或陷阱捕捉
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+purple紫→v.使成紫色 v.发紫
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+act行动→进入行动→颁布[法令]
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+chant反复说;咒语→被咒语所迷醉
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+courage勇气→使人进入勇气→鼓励
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+danger危险→v.使危险
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+franchise特权,公民权→给予选举权

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使忙碌, 雇佣, 预定
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……进入状态或加强等意思+gage挑战→进入挑战→忙碌于……
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+large大→v.扩大, 放大
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+light光+en变成→给人光明→启发
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+list名单→进入名单→入伍

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使富足, 使肥沃, 装饰, 加料于, 浓缩
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……进入状态或加强等意思+rich富的→v.使富足, 使肥沃, 装饰, 加料于, 浓缩

stems_affixes.value_cn: 包裹, 围绕, 包围;使专注
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……进入状态或加强等意思+wrap包裹→v.包裹, 围绕, 包围;使专注

Sentence.sentence: When that flow is interrupted, we feel the pain in short supplies and higher prices, At the same time, we derive massive economic benefits when we buy the most affordable energy on the world market and when we engage in energy trade around the world.
It is something people all engage in.
Recent reports found that lodging with a student of a different race may decrease prejudice and compel students to engage in more ethnically diverse friendships.
Compared with early generations we spend more and more time working and have less and less free time to engage in leisure pursues.
In writing about their own experiences many applicants slip into clichés, thus failing to engage the reader.
Compressing everything into three years also leaves less time for growing up, engaging in extracurricular activities, and studying abroad.

means.word_mean: (用诺言、誓言、保证、合同、契约等)约束(自己)；约定；许诺；保证；使负有责任(或义务)；对(债务等)给以担保

sentences.en: She engaged herself to repay her debt within two months.
sentences.cn: 她答应在两个月内偿还她的债务。

means.word_mean: [现只用于被动语态]使受婚约的约束，使订婚，同…订婚 (to)
吸引或引起(注意、兴趣等)；引起…的注意(或兴趣、好感等)；抓牢

sentences.en: The new novel engaged his attention and interest.
sentences.cn: 这部新小说引起了他的注意和兴趣。
她的好脾气使得人人都喜欢她。

sentences.en: Jimmy Lin and his model girlfriend Kelly Chen got engaged last year.
sentences.cn: 林志颖和他的模特女友陈若仪去年订婚了。

means.word_mean: 保证，担保；承担义务；答应，允诺 (for)

sentences.en: I was unwilling to engage on such terms.
sentences.cn: 根据这样的条件我不愿答应。

sentences.en: The teeth in one wheel engage with those of another.
sentences.cn: 一个齿轮的齿与另一齿轮的齿相啮合。

jushi.english: Bright colours engage a baby's attention.
jushi.chinese: 鲜艳的颜色引起婴孩的注意。

jushi.english: I've engaged a room at the hotel.
jushi.chinese: 我已经在旅馆里预订了一个房间。
